titleStmt.title: Prince Rupert, his reply to a pamphlet entituled The Parliaments vindication in answer to Prince Ruperts declaration published by His Excellencies special command to informe all His Majesties good subjects what false aspersions have beene cast upon him.
titleStmt.author: Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Oxford by Leonard Lichfield, and now reprinted at London for Humphrey Blundevill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
